question: The proposed Sethusamudram Shipping Canal Project would link between which of the following?
option1: Gulf of Katch and Gulf of Khambat
option3: Gulf of Mannar and Palk Bay
answer: Gulf of Mannar and Palk Bay
explanation: The proposed Sethusamudram Shipping Canal Project would link between Gulf of Mannar and Palk Bay. The project may hamper the ecological balance and destroy the corals and marine life of the Gulf of Mannar.
